lines.text:
[to Fenix]
You can't atone for your sins with nightmares.
[Fenix glances at The Invisible Man poster]
Without me you are nothing. No one sees you and no one notices you. Just like your stupid hero.
She's a deaf mute and you can do whatever you want with her.

[to Fenix]
With your hands and my body, we'll have an act that will be sensational.
It's always roosters or swans! You never see anything else in your ridiculous hallucinations.

[Concha begins to control his hands]
Watch out, Saint! For now you have to fight me off.
What's happening to you? Are you going crazy?
Kill her! Kill her!
Did you hear her? She wants me to kill you with my hands.
[last lines]

[on megaphone]
Put your hands up!

[begins to raise hands]
My hands... My hands! My hands.
[laughs]
[first lines]
[Fenix crouches naked atop a tree trunk in his barren asylum room]

[enters along with orderlies pushing a food cart]
Fenix. Please...
[offers him a normal meal]
Eat like a human being.
[pause]
[puts the tray back down and offers him a raw fish]
[howls]
[jumps down and grabs the fish]
Grr!
[sits and begins eating it]
You can't just stay here all the time, not seeing anyone.
[pause]
Now come on, stand up.
[Young Fenix sobs]
Stop crying... like a little girl.
[pause]
I'll give you a charm. That'll make you a man.

[leads Fenix and the handicapped boys away from ticket counter]
Vengan, vengan. Come, I have a present for you.
[points to movie posters]
Listen, this kind of stuff will make you sick. If you promise not to tell, I'll take you somewhere else... that's much more fun that the movies. A little sniff of this...
[opens packet of cocaine]
and we'll see.
You know what you have to do.
No, I don't want to!
This girl has defiled you with her lust.
No, mum, it's not true! It's only a game!
[begins to lose control of his hands]
No! I can't! Don't ask me to!
I'm not asking you, I'm ordering... my hands... and my arms... to kill her. Kill her!
I'm sorry... I was having an hallucination...
